attributes.action: Ensure that any profits made from 2nd homes for MPs should go back into the public purse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As there has been so much in the news about MPs having large allowances for second homes, we petition the government to ensure that any profits made from MPs after selling 2nd homes (improved from the public purse) should go back into the public purse when sold, so as to redress the balance. This money should not go into the MPs pocket when the house is sold on.
